About this sample.Protocol: High pressure freezing, freeze-substitution resin embedding with 2% OsO<sub>4</sub> 0.1% UA 3% H<sub>2</sub>O in acetone; resin embedding in Eponate 12.
About this sample.Contributions: Sample provided by Aubrey Weigel (HHMI/Janelia), prepared for imaging by Gleb Shtengel (HHMI/Janelia), with imaging and post-processing by C. Shan Xu (HHMI/Janelia).
